lines.text: Women tend to themselves, huh? Men just take a piss.
Never try to bribe a man with something he can take anyway.
I had a woman run off on me once... mailed her a suitcase.

[to Catherine, at the campsite]
Make some coffee.
I don't want to make coffee, thank you...
I don't give a damn what you want. Make some coffee.

[Fumbling with the coffee pot, obviously clueless]
I don't know how to make coffee. I'm sorry.

[Discussing an escape plan with Dawes]
As soon as it gets dark, I'll get my horse and go.

[Skeptical]
Yeah? How ya' gonna' manage that?
I'll just say I have to... "tend to myself."
Women "tend to themselves," huh?... Men just take a piss.
I told you I didn't want anybody killed back there!
Yeah, well, I forgot.
Well, now! If she don't look as fresh as a daisy beside an outhouse!
Give me the horse and let me go. I won't tell a soul, I promise.
Why not?
Because I'm running away, too.

[pauses]
Mm hmm.

[to Billy]
Throw her ass on a horse.

[Regarding Charlie]
He wanted to be a leader like his father. He ended up being an imitation white man.

[Smoking a cigar as Jay and Catherine are visiting his tent]
The cigar was one of the white man's "good" inventions.
